summary:
I'm a good team player as well as a independent worker.

I performed complete overhauls on LM1600 and LM2500 during my period in the overhaul shop at Thomassen International and General Electric. During the overhaul of an engine I performed tasks like: Disassembly, Inspection, Repair, Assembly, Rotor Stacking, Rotor balancing, etc.

During my Field Service work with General Electric and TransCanada Turbines I have worked at Power plants, Offshore facilities, Navy ships and High speed ferries all over the world.
The jobs that I have performed in the field are: Inspections, Troubleshooting, Engine changes, Hot section replacements, HPC blade changes, Engine repairs, etc.

From 2008 till 2011 I have been immigrated to Spain to support a business contract between TransCanada Turbines and a local Customer. During this period I also worked as Field Service Rep. global.

Currently I operate as Field Service Rep. based from the Netherlands.
